title: An Act protecting consumers in interactions with artificial intelligence systems

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Rogers of Cambridge and Vargas of Haverhill, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 97) of David M. Rogers and Andres X. Vargas relative to consumers interactions with artificial intelligence systems.  Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

related_entities.name: committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

actions.description: Hearing rescheduled to 09/11/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to include Virtual
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means
